import Select from "react-select"; import "./employeecardstyle.css"; import { auth } from "../../firebase"; import imag from "./userlogin.png"; const Certificate = [ { value: "certificate", label: "Certificate" }, { value: "100", label: "Milestone" }, { value: "50", label: "Courses" }, ]; const Shift = [ { value: "Shift", label: "Shift" }, { value: "Day", label: "Evening" }, { value: "Night", label: "Night" }, ]; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; function EmployeeCard(props) { const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ Date: "", Shift :"", Certificate:"", Hour:"", }); return (

{props.name ? `Welcome - ${props.name}` : "Login please"}



Submit or Add Leave or SignOut
); } export default EmployeeCard;
